metadata.title: CVE-2021-42522 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a Information Disclosure vulnerability inanjuta/plugins/document-manager/anjuta-bookmarks.c. This issue was causedby the incorrect use of libxml2 API. The vendor forgot to call 'g_free()'to release the return value of 'xmlGetProp()'.

criterions.comment: anjuta: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
